channel.title: Galaxy of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the galaxy of the day.

item.title: List of names for the Milky Way
item.description: This list of names for the Milky Way are in various languages. Some of them derive from myths, which can be found at Milky Way (mythology). Before galaxies in the modern sense were discovered, in Europe "the Galaxy" was another name for the Milky Way.
